SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: The user information will be returned in a flat object.

PARAMETERS.NAME: contactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The aXcelerate ContactID the user is associated with

PARAMETERS.NAME: username
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Username. It will be auto-generated if not provided. Username is being phased out with the new global accounts.

PARAMETERS.NAME: domainID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The DomainID. Set the Domain for the User

PARAMETERS.NAME: roleID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Role to assign the User to. If this is omitted; aXcelerate will try to set them to Learner if the Default Role has been configured (In Additional Options)

PARAMETERS.NAME: sendEmail
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Send the user creation invitation email. In most cases, this should be set to true, except possibly when user access is managed by Corporate Identity Providers.

DESCRIPTION: Creates a new User. The parameters below refer only to POST requests.
